reviews.review: This should’ve been the first movie. Things from the first movie seem irrelevant now but at least backstory was given. Plot holes and lots of plot conveniences throughout this films. It was an ok experience overall. Good enough to see if you’re curious :)
What a great movie. I love when you find out the back story to why things are the way they are.

Upon watching Frozen 2, I realized that Frozen 2 brought nothing to the cinematic table of 2019. Many play off it being bad for just being "A Children's Film" , but that doesn't mean films for children can't be enjoyed by a more mature audience. The songs were forgettable, and walking out of the theatre my fellow watchers thought we had a stroke. Jonathan Groff's singing was slightly enjoyable, but the whole boyband reindeer group was a literal drug trip. Olaf's sudden remarks that were played out to be "hilarious" made me feel as if he was trying way too hard. After Olaf got "Thanos snapped" I thought that it would be the ending of his terrible remarks and awful humor. Instead it brought Ana's darkness is dark moment, which then led up to her trying to destroy her home and birthplace Arendelle. Why did the group leave Kristoff in the beginning with Ryder, who I think is a better love interest for Kristoff then Ana ever will be. Elsa leaving Arendelle for the spirit woods was a mistake because it doesn't show her overcoming her fright of ruling Arendelle. Ana and her naive self would be an awful leader for Arendelle and would probably lead to be the downfall of Arendelle. Frozen 3 Arendelle is a dictatorship,or Frozen 3 Arendelle is communist, the only absolute ending of the Frozen series.
Every detail about the movie was amazing
Loved the movie and so did the kids!
This movie was good,funny and will I dont want to give it all away. I will be buying it when it comes out on dvd. My daughter and I love it
Frozen II has more songs and more humor!
A great followup. Nice to see a Disney film in which the characters mature at an appropriate rate.

Oh my goodness!!! This movie is better than the first one. I mean, the first one has its own beautiful charm. We loved it so much that we had to see it again the next day. Really has a lot of great messages.
